title: What’s with the controversial Indonesia new capital “Nusantara”?
summary: We know that the new capital of Indonesia has become a fantastic phenomenon because its official name has already been announced. The new capital will use “Nusantara” as its name. But, besides the name, what other things that’s so controversial about this?

title: What’s with the controversial Indonesia new capital “Nusantara”?

title: How Rented Relationship Become a Thing
summary: Some people think that an online relationship is just a temporary solution to loneliness, others were thinking the opposite. Those who think such, tend to use dating apps and built a relationship there. But, the people who only need a temporary solution are using a ‘rented’ one.
